name: Path of Ancestors
description:
Path of Ancestors is a first-person puzzle-platformer adventure game through some abandonded temple ruins. To overcome all the challenges and retrieve the powerful orb that lies in the last chamber of the temple, you will have the help of two spirits. Nonetheless, the spirits won't act on their own. You will have to give them the correct orders to them and cooperate with them in order to get to the last chamber.
